website_summaries.verdict: Solid performance for a more reasonable price than models with similar features.
pros: Hoover's SpinScrub 360 brushes and three-speed brush roll make it efficient and powerful
Clean Surge Control lets you apply extra detergent to get out tough stains
Users tell us the dirty water tank is easily removed and emptied
cons: Some users are not satisfied with the amount of power

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price. No big complaints or issues.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good on carpet and car upholstery. I recommend a final rinse with plain water to help get all of the soap/detergent out of the material, but overall it worked well for the two days of straight cleaning. If there's one thing i would change, it's some sort of handle for the dirty water tank. If the clean water tank is full, you can't lay the handle down, so you have to hold that with one hand, which leaves you one to remove the dirty tank, and it's rather difficult to do with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts - Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: I now remember why I NEVER buy Hoover. Amazon perfect in delivery as ALWAYS! Putting the machine together missing bolts and nuts, contact customer service. I have to go to a LOCAL HOOVER repair store, bring the unit and have them work on it. Ok... call the repair center, I HAVE TO GIVE THEM A DEPOSIT FOR FIXING IT, MISSING PARTS PEOPLE.... never again. Sending it back, ordering Bissel or Shark
customer_reviews.author: Red Raven

customer_reviews.title: Leaves rug wet
customer_reviews.text: I never return anything, but this carpet cleaner will not suck up the cleaning fluid. I used a box fan to dry the rug so it wouldn't start to mold. Online support was very nice - told me to clean vents, etc - but that worked for 2 seconds. I used it on a low pile rug and thoroughly vacuumed the rug to remove any hair or debris. Also, this is not "steam" cleaning; you use warm water from the tap. "Clean Surge" dumps more water on the carpet. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lost suction
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning it. Used it twice and then it stopped sucking up water. Even when it was fully working, it didnt get the stain out of the carpet. Stain was from tracking salt in winter.. May have worked fine in a different situation so left it at 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAmazonUser85

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: I owned a Hoover cleaner years ago that worked beautifully. This one however, is a joke. First, after using 3 containers of soapy water, the suction was so low only 20% was being picked up. Then the brushes quit running. I knew I was in trouble when I listed the model number, and Outlook filled in the blanks for me "brushes don't work". 'You Tube' was full of repairs for this model. Huge mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hanes

customer_reviews.title: will not clean or suction
customer_reviews.text: Do Not purchase it's heavy, cheaply made and will not suction the water from carpet. I spent 3 hrs. trying to extract water. Finall gave up. went to grocery store rented a machine to suction water. I trouble shot and cleaned dirty water tank...nothing worked. The hose for tools is NOT flexible . I have cleaned carpet many times. Never had a machine sooo cheaply made. Worst part ..It will not suction..
customer_reviews.author: nancyskindle

customer_reviews.title: Lose suction
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine at the start then about 2 hours later it starts losing suction for no reason, I waited too long to try it and I’m stuck with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy V

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shampooer! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampooer on the advice of my sister. It has lived up to my expectations. My beige carpets are at least 10 years old and look almost brand new! I have thick padding and I thought it would take forever to dry, boy was I wrong! It took approximately 3 hours to try a large living room and two hallways! Trust the reviews!!! It’s a great machine!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lezlie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans fantastic, worth every penny to have one on hand.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this cleans. It's a bit annoying to have to touch the dirty water container to put the handheld tool on here, I do wish they would figure out a way to make this easier to attach without touching gross dirty water container. But it cleans fantastic, and the spinning tool is perfect for pre-cleaning tough spots, getting stains off carpeted stairs or upholstery. Worth every penny if you have kids or pets to have one on hand, and the faster you clean the mess the easier it comes out. Rinse and sanitize the dirty water container with Lysol or Fabuloso after every cleaning to keep the filter from smelling like rotting poo.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Accardi

customer_reviews.title: Good performance, cheap-feeling parts.  So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well. Have used it once for about 2 hours on whole house. Scrubbing rotors are strong and actually scrub. Hand rotor is surprisingly strong too and doesn’t stop spinning when moderate pressure is applied. All in all, happy w performance so far. Pieces are a little flimsy, plastic is thin and may or may not hold up long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! This was SO easy to assemble and use. I took it out of the box, assembled it, set it up, and cleaned the whole top floor of our house in under 90 minutes. Super impressed at how well it cleaned the carpets. I also used the attachment on the stairs and it worked beautifully. Clean up was also a breeze. I’m very picky when it comes to cleaning. It’s hard to impress me. This did the job!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wow it really cleans good.
customer_reviews.text: Really works as expected and better. Used several times it is easy to use, easy to clean, and cleans better than the people you hire. The only fault I found was the hose does not stay put when using and I tried several different ways to improve it but not successful. Also the roller brush tends to collect lint that is difficult to remove. These two things don’t affect the proformance of this machine so I gave it still a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tomberlin

customer_reviews.title: well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I hate renting carpet shampooers because you spend the first hour or so cleaning the thing so you can use it after the person who used it before you and didn't clean it. I bought this and was very happy with the work it did, it cleaned deeply and the extraction of water was so good that my rugs were completely dry in just two hours. The brushes come out and make clean up after as easy as possible. I am very happy with my purchase and the results it gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Cathey

customer_reviews.title: This is not a steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Disregard the lie in its name. It is not a steam cleaner. It sprays hot water onto a carpet and then vacuums it up. (Note that it doesn't heat the water itself. You fill its reservoir with hot water.) The instructions are incomprehensible, seemingly written more to avoid legal liability than to enable users to use it. I still haven't figured out how to use the hose attachment. It cleans ok.
customer_reviews.author: David Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: Top notch product
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought oh, it’s plastic it probably will not run very well. I was completely surprised and pleased with how well it works. We have 2 dogs... Enough said. 2 years ago we had our carpet professionally cleaned, at that time they told me that I would be calling them frequently due to having two dogs. The cost of this carpet cleaner was less then I paid to have our carpet professionally cleaned and it works just as well. And I have the satisfaction of knowing I did it. Thank you for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Not like the older Hoover steam vacs
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hoover steam cleaners for over 20 years, and this one just isn't doing the job my past cleaners have done. It cleans well enough, but it just doesn't suck up the water nearly as well. I cleaned my bedroom carpet, and had fans on it to dry it quicker, but it took two days to dry. Now Im afraid to do the rest of the carpets, as I don't like wet floors for two days. Kind of disappointed really.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fast shipping, well-packaged, easy assembly. Went to work 30 minutes after pulling from box. Did a great job on a heavily soiled carpet with single application. Cured cat's cancer. Should handle all but the worst carpet/floor stains for you. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby-Rob-Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. It really does a thorough deep clean. This machine helped me get rid of stains that have been there for months! It doesn't heat the water, you have to use hot water from tap. The water tank is big enough to cover my living room and upholstery in living room with still a quarter tank left. This is definitely worth the money. For regular carpets only....shag or thicker carpets it wouldnt clean as well or may cause the cleaner to over heat from clogging
customer_reviews.author: shay s.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Most of the floors in my house are wood, but the stairs and the hallway to the bedrooms are carpeted. After living in the house for 12 years I've only steamed cleaned the stair steps and hallway carpet once (we do take our shoes off before we enter the house) but they were you looking pretty grungy, and the new puppy insists on using the landing to throw up on. This did an amazing job of cleaning the steps/carpets, including the throw-up stains. Should have bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: lmwaagen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as good as it's predecessor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to replace an older Hoover SteamVac that served me well for a number of years. This is most definitely not the great machine my old one was - it sprays solution in streaks, then does a very poor job of picking up dirty water. Most definitely not suitable if you have rugs sitting on hardwood floors. In addition, when I tried to clean it, a lever stuck and I had to turn the machine over to jiggle it loose. Don't waste your money on this dog
customer_reviews.author: M S Moser

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I live in a rental and at least once a year I go rent the Doctor from the store. I decided to try this thinking if I got three or more uses out of it I would be saving time and money. I love this thing. Works great and easy to use. I baby sit my grand kids and now I don't have to panic and run out if a disaster strikes. I've used it several times now and everything is operating as advertised. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Van Aken

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!  Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly and operation were easy after reading the manual! This machine lifted several months of kid and dog grit out of my carpets and upholstery! Have 5 kids and 3 dogs in the house makes for lots of messes! This machine surprised me at how well it works for the price
customer_reviews.author: Warren Morley

customer_reviews.title: I had a different model for years and it was amazing. This steam vac does not have enough power ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean carpet AT ALL. We have 2 dogs/2 cats - This product is awful. I had a different model for years and it was amazing. This steam vac does not have enough power to pull stains out of carpet and is not worth the money spent. I don't know how this product stays on the market. BEYOND disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: herdingbuckeye

customer_reviews.title: So far amazing! I’ve only had it one day
customer_reviews.text: So far amazing! I’ve only had it one day, cleaned whole carpet, made such a difference! Made carpet cleaner and softer, dried very quickly. I had older model that lasted 8years, with lots of wear and tear. This one has updated handheld equipment, works just a great if not better. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK but not stellar
customer_reviews.text: Good design. But : small tanks. Finicky tank replacement. Dinky accessory attachment. Feeble cleaning solution as supplied with the product. Compared to what ? Compared to the Rug Doctor you can rent from say Stop & Shop. A good product short of being great.
customer_reviews.author: Urmuz

customer_reviews.title: Good job. A bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, as if you use hot water, the dirt /dust will come out of your carpet. Have not seen a too significant difference in the carpet ‘s color ( Mayberry not dirty enough) , but the color of the water after cleaning was the proof of the good job. However not always easy to navigate around with it as it’s fairly big and heavy. Still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight works great
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my old one that got conveniently “lost” by the movers. This seems more plastic and lightweight but I love it works just the same and easier to push around and way cheaper. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chamele

customer_reviews.title: Best carpet cleaner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this older model of Hoover carpet cleaner. Over 20 years this is my 3rd or 4th one Ive bought. The newer model my mom bought in 2018 didnt even last a year. Picks up the water extremely well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not my job to fix your product regardless of “window” of return.
customer_reviews.text: This device is not helpful at all. I have used it twice. The glue of hose connection has peeled away. The device itself is awkward. With a device that isn’t required often the window of return defeats desire to work with manufacture again. In future I will return all devices within “window” after one use so as not to be burdened.
customer_reviews.author: ENJ

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: My carpet was disgusting and since it was a light tan color I though there was no way the stains would come out - I was so wrong - looks like I bought new carpet again - Easy to use and works fantastic - And the price was incredible - Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Tomasko

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an old unit and glad I did. I didnt realize how bad mine was till I turn this on, very powerful great suction and clean carpets. Thats all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year now and it works very well. When I first took it out of the box and put it together I was concerned that it seemed a bit flimsy and poorly constructed, but it works really well and I am very happy with it. I like the way the brushes work and the suction is very good! It also blows warm air so if you go over the cleaned carpet a few times after spraying it, it dries pretty quick. I have also used the hose attachments on furniture and like the results. It does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: page

customer_reviews.title: A steal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research on this product and it was highly rated. We just bought a house with mostly carpeted rooms so instead of renting a shampooer every month I figured I'd buy one We also have 2 dogs and have already cleaned up pee spots with the handle attachment and it works great! No stain or smell. Super easy to use and and works great. Would HIGHLY suggest this product to people that like to keep their carpet like new or if they kids and pets and have to constantly keep cleaning up messes.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Did a good job cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Did a good job cleaning. It was good for occasional use. Would not recommend for constant use,like a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Bob SS

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Follow the assembly directions and there is no issue putting it together. Cleans very well and we liked the Hoover, Expert Clean solution for our use. We had a dog stain from 10 years ago that we had cleaned over the years but kept reappearing (oil from her coat, I guess) and after going over the spot twice with this unit we have not seen it reappear. Not at all hard to maneuver, empty or use. We store it in the closet with the vacuum. So glad we broke down and bought this instead of the hassle of renting those very heavy commercial jobs from store. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMMT

customer_reviews.title: Overall good item
customer_reviews.text: Would have rated 5 stars but the handle release broke after using only 2 times ..tried to order the part and it is obsolete so im assuming this happens a lot since you can't find a replacement part anywhere I even tried EBay no luck
customer_reviews.author: karona crusoe

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my large sectional. The powered spinning brush gives a deep scrubbing. Feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first room. After that it clogged up and would not pick up the dirty water. All of that dirty water just stayed on the floor in the carpet. Would never buy again. If I could I would send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Set Up, Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: The day I set it up I put hot water in to try to get out an old dark stain on my carpet and it was gone in seconds. Well worth the price. I clean my carpets and stairs in half the time due to its efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner is great. My carpets look brand new after cleaning them. I highly recommend this product. I’ve had it for over a year, used it multiple times and have had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: LEE ANNA HALL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: We got a dog a year ago and we have a white carpet. What were we thinking?! But this machine has proved to be invaluable. We save so much money cleaning the carpet ourselves instead of paying to have it cleaned. We use it to spot clean and have used it on the entire carpet and upholstery. Our carpet looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Beanbag

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Only complaint, but is with all of these cleaners, the tanks aren’t big enough. It seems like you spend more time emptying and refilling than using. The attachment works great for car seat furniture etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a while now and no real complaints. Does a super job of cleaning carpet and the upholstery tool works great as well. If I had any issue does feel a little fragile with lots of plastic but nothing has broken so nitpicking a little. I definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a while now. The stupid hand held piece broke off so we duct taped it. It works otherwise. I have an autistic son and we need to use this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Directions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Awful difficult to switch from floor to stairs. Directions are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: boat

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times now for small strips of carpet and for entire rooms. I've been very pleased with it. Easy to use and works well--even for pet stains. I haven't use the attachments yet so I can't speak to those. I only which there was a light to indicate when the clean water / soap reservoir was empty.
customer_reviews.author: Spalizzi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Did my whole house using the Hoover brand cleaner and my carpets were spotless. This is our second one and the first one lasted for 10 years. Hope this one lasts just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: the videos are useless, I need more detail rather than a super ...
customer_reviews.text: I Cannot assemble the thing,,,, I got the first parts done ok, but when it came to connecting the hose..... the videos are useless, I need more detail rather than a super fast picture!! It still sits and my carpets are still dirty!!
customer_reviews.author: June Edington

customer_reviews.title: Too much work!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does a fairly good job, however you will need to search UTube videos on how to use the upholstery tool as their instructions are very vague. Connecting and lining this up is difficult and it will not work properly unless it is perfect. I would not buy this machine again. I've used other cleaners and the upholstery tool was just a flick of a switch. This machine requires taking apart and putting back together each time.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to put together and worked great
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to put together and worked great. Tanks are easy to remove, fill and clean. Very easy to use except for the brush removal, that is very tricky and you have to make sure you place a towel under it while removing them or else you will have water all over.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet cleaner for the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you will find a better carpet cleaner for twice as much! This is my second one, first one lasted me over 20 years! I decided to go with the new version of my old cleaner. It works well, I have 3 dogs, one of which is old.
customer_reviews.author: Howard E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quits working
customer_reviews.text: It broke after the second run it won’t suck up the dirty water anymore so all my carpets are just covered in wet dirty muck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J

customer_reviews.title: good n great
customer_reviews.text: the Vac works well. However you need to buy the Steam attachments which isn't stated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Big help with allergies
customer_reviews.text: We inherited a cat and my allergies were terrible. My husband decided to give this vacuum a try and it has made a big difference. A regular vacuum will get rid of dust and hair but this vacuum goes deeper. It’s a little bit heavy but my husband doesn’t mind doing the vacuuming. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: C. Barranon

customer_reviews.title: YAY!
customer_reviews.text: Finally....a cleaner that removes 99% of the water it puts in!....that's rare!
customer_reviews.author: Tamera G. Strong

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works well
customer_reviews.text: Liked it for the way it removes some of the worst stains in out carpet
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Unit easy to operate and cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: Have to make sure water receptacle and water feed tank are all seated properly or unit will not work
customer_reviews.author: SW George

customer_reviews.title: Easy to empty “dirty bin” - cleans up well
customer_reviews.text: Handy and lightweight. Cleans well. Was very affordable so I don’t expect it to last forever; well worth the price. Easy to empty “dirty bin” - cleans up well. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like having to empty the dirty water so often and refilling the soapy water. The carpet does get clean.
customer_reviews.author: LovesToRead

customer_reviews.title: Love it/Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this cleaner. I have had Hoovers in the past and I am so glad I bought this one. The suction and cleaning works great. I haven't used all the attachments yet, but the floor cleaning option works really well. It is very easy to maneuver and not very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: nicblue23

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job in cleaning rugs. we have 3 pups and this machine thoroughly cleans the rugs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The suction on this machine is outstanding - Very Please Again with Hoover ! ---- This is our 4th Hoover Carpet Cleaner... Each one of the 4 prior units lasted between 10 and 12 years... That in it's self is Outstanding.... That's why we stay with "Hoover"
customer_reviews.author: G.M.

customer_reviews.title: but it wasn't easy either. I don't like how complicated it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel that it could be simpler to use. Putting it together was not exactly difficult, but it wasn't easy either . I don't like how complicated it is to switch from bottom suction to hand held.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Steamer
customer_reviews.text: It is a good steamer for cleanup carpet stains, and pickup accidental spills. It has strong sucking power, is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: zxw

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it, I’ve had this type of Hoover vac before, always done me right and I like the hot water you can add to it.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Grace

customer_reviews.title: Works better than a Bissell
customer_reviews.text: Great value I was using a friend's Bissell and this actually works better and a fraction of the cost. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: kimiko

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. This thing NEVER worked since the day I bought it, can I return it for a refund? The first time I turned it on, the entire bucket just leaked all over the ground, and never suctioned it up! Nothing was in the waste bucket either. It’s 100lbs, it’s loud, and definitely not worth the price. Smh.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: works very well.
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy to move about & tiring to use, but does a very good job of cleaning carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Huge waste of my time. Major pain to assemble and convert to upholstery cleaner. Water barely trickles out of upholstery tool. Soaked my entire carpet just for it to quit working after first full tank. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra

customer_reviews.title: Cleans carpet well.
customer_reviews.text: Used this shampooer for the first time last week and the carpet looks great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift . It is just like the older Hoover it replaced. The pumps never go bad in these compared to bissell. Would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Zirk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cleans great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Hoover Steam Vac Plus!! It's the best carpet cleaner that I have ever purchased! My carpet dried very fast. I would recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Perez

customer_reviews.title: Awful, lost suction at second use, stay away
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products, amazon sold. Lost suction at second use, the dirty water was not pulled and stored in the tank. Hence, my carpet got too wet with all those water which was not sucked by the cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Deepu

customer_reviews.title: Wow. It's big
customer_reviews.text: It's big. Not super big. But bigger than my last one. Read the directions. I'm glad I did. I never read the directions. But I had to. It's so massive. And does so much.
customer_reviews.author: lpita2012

customer_reviews.title: That its great.
customer_reviews.text: My friend had the older version of this cleaner and I was always borrowing it. With a German Shepherd, I was constantly using hers and when I had to give it back, I was dying. So I finally gave in and decided to order my own. This thing is the new model and I LOVEEE it.
customer_reviews.author: lisaannnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well. Plastic piece that holds it's position upright snapped off, during normal operation.
customer_reviews.author: Chanpete

customer_reviews.title: I applaud thisCarpet Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaner is very well designed. Its easy to use, easy to clean, doesnt leak at times like my old bissell did and did a great job. Although it is larger, it is light weight but sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe all the cat hair my vacuum missed!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great! It dug up so much pet hair that my vacuum didn't. It's a little bulky, but that was expected. The attachment don't sit very well on it like they're supposed to so I just take them off and store in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my last Hoover that finally died. This works great and my carpets have never been cleaner !!! This model is my favorite one!
customer_reviews.author: Jswife4life

customer_reviews.title: Love the hot steam cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean my living room carpet. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: shirley bishop

customer_reviews.title: Best choice!
customer_reviews.text: I finally switched from bissell to hoover and I couldn't be happier with this machine. It does twice the work in half the time
customer_reviews.author: NikkiB22

customer_reviews.title: went nice and slow and steady
customer_reviews.text: Solid rig. Cleaned the carpet very well, went nice and slow and steady. Pretty good capacity as well. Really brought the carpet back and well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriejm

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly - only used once so far but it did an amazingly good job on a very filthy man-cave carpet! Went through a quart of the 2X Clean Plus soap fairly quickly; it might be a good idea to order a larger size. Overall very pleased with the ease of use and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Broughton

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work and I am a BIG Hoover fan I own 2 of the bigger ones. This one wouldn't suck up water like it should and you had to refill too many times and I just have a small area. It's going back!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Blazen

customer_reviews.title: I've had two of these & they are great. My first one lasted 20 years & was ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these & they are great. My first one lasted 20 years & was repaired once. Hope this one is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jan the reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: after the first few uses it does a good job. not a steamer though
customer_reviews.author: William Hunter

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review on Amazon. I used it once, I tried using it today no suction. Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: EddieP.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Works good for what we needed it for. It seems a bit flimsy but have not had any problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Coartney

customer_reviews.title: Works good, expected a little better quality. If I can get a couple uses out of it I guess it will be worth what it cost. I don
customer_reviews.text: Cleans good, does need a better seal on return tank. Takes longer to dry than stated.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. Carpet & sofa look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wonder
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out loads of dirt. It’s hard to believe there was that much dirt in my carpets'
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good but tricky
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great, does not over saturate the carpet. Getting the clean water holder to snap in place is tricky. Mine flew off & broke the plastic handle so now I Have to rubber band it in place til I get a new handle. Make sure it snaps into place!!!!
customer_reviews.author: linda hawkins

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: 1st use, it is absolutely amazing! My carpet dried within 45 minutes. I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine after 3 cleanings. Easy to operate. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Viachaslau Laryoshyn

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this model. Finally took a dump on me after years of good use. This new upgraded version works 100 times better and is quicker to clean with due to the oscillating brushes underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: Cleans thoroughly, lots of power!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a workhorse! Cleans very well and has lots of power!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this carpet cleaner for almost a year. It works well, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Slippers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This carpet cleaning machine works incredibly!!!! I was hesitant about purchasing one because they never are what you expect them to be. However, this one cleans sooooo well and is very easy to use and to empty out & clean! Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the mightiest of machines but decent for the $
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent product. A lot of cheap parts and it doesn’t clean nearly as well as the rental machines we’ve used in the past but for $120 it’s aboit what you’d expect.
customer_reviews.author: joseph jones

customer_reviews.title: I got it fridge sprung a leak cleans carpet well ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it fridge sprung a leak cleans carpet well very powerful carpet almost dry when done picking up the water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hoover SteamVac Plus Carpet Cleaner with Clean Surge - F5914901NC
product_meta.description: Style Name:SteamVac PlusHoover SteamVac Plus is deep cleaning and quick drying. Hoover Spin Scrub counter-rotating brushes scrub all angles of your carpet fibers for an all-around deep clean. Push the Clean Surge button to apply extra detergent to stubborn stains. With an abundance of features such as Brush Speed Control, Heated Cleaning and the included Powered Upholstery & Stair Tool, the Hoover SteamVac Plus is a great choice for your carpets and upholstery
feature_bullets: Clean water capacity 133 ounces. Spin Scrub 360 Brushes - counter-rotating brushes scrub all angles of your carpet fibers for an all-around deep clean
Dual Tanks - easy-to-fill tanks keep cleaning solution and dirty water separate
3-Speed Brush roll Control - High for normal cleaning, low for gentle cleaning, off for spill pick-up
Heated Cleaning - applies heat to speed drying time
Clean Surge Control - fingertip control applies extra detergent to stains and heavy traffic areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars492 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Carpet Cleaner^16oz Expert Clean Solution^SpinSCrub Hand Tool^Upholstery tool^
